column1:
Dear Student,

â€˜The e-Waste Project might be able to help you with finding
motors and relays needed for your project.

Send your request via email to the e-Waste Project team
(with the subject line: "Request: Items for ELEC 33542
Research Project"

In the request email, you should mention the specifications
of the required parts. For example:

12V SPDT Relay: Trigger Current : 100mA; Maximum AC
load current: 7A @ 250/125V AC; Maximum DC load
current: 10A @ 30/28V DC.
